data.text:
The BoulderCentre for Orthopedics & Spine scheduling team found the perfect Halloween costume this year: Pearl, their AI scheduling assistant! 

Pearl helps BoulderCentre manage patient calls, appointments, and schedule changes quickly and efficiently. Seeing their team embrace her so enthusiastically reminds us why we built these tools in the first place: to free up staff from routine tasks so they can focus on patients. 

We love seeing our partners make room for creativity while using Assort Health tools to improve patient care. Thank you to the BoulderCentre team for bringing Pearl to life in such a fun way.

resharedPost.text:
Assort is #hiring for our Founding Customer Success Lead!

Join a fast-growing team shaping the future of AI in healthcare and partner with our incredible network of customers.

If youâ€™re passionate about building relationships, driving outcomes, and making an impact from day one - please reach out!!

author.headline: Agent Deployment Lead @ Assort Health

data.text: Assort Health is building the agentic OS powering the future of healthcare â€” and we're hiring a Founding Customer Success Lead to help our healthcare partners thrive. Come join us!

author.headline: SVP of Ops @ Assort Health

resharedPost.text:
A patientâ€™s journey shouldnâ€™t start with â€œplease hold.â€ Today, weâ€™re announcing $102M to ensure it never happens again.

Ten years ago, Galym and I shook hands on our first ventureâ€”a small nonprofit with a big ambition to make healthcare investing more impactful. 

Today, weâ€™re partnering again in a new way: a $76M Series B featured in Fortune and led by Lightspeed, which brings Assort Health's total funding to $102M. Galym is joining our board, and weâ€™re thrilled to welcome Paul Ricci (founding CEO of Nuance Communications) as a board advisor. 

I left UCSF med school and Stanford AI research because I couldnâ€™t accept that patients spend more time waiting on hold than with their doctors. Assort Health is making sure they never have to again.

The funding will be used to scale Assort OS: an all-in-one patient experience platform powered by agentic AI via voice, text, web, and email. It handles the most complex aspects of access, including scheduling, care navigation, lab coordination, prescription renewals, referrals, and more.

Before: endless hold times, wrong doctors, missed care.Â 
After: seamless scheduling, faster care, happier patients.

What this means in practice: 89% shorter wait times, 98% resolution rates, and patient ratings > 4.6/5 across hundreds of organizationsâ€”driven by tens of millions of patient interactions at thousands of providers.

To every practice and health system tired of hold music: weâ€™d love to show you a better way.

And if youâ€™re excited to help us build the future of patient access, weâ€™re hiring across growth, ops, and engineering.

With Assort, weâ€™re ending the dreaded hold musicâ€”once and for all!

Huge appreciation to all of our investors for this round: Lightspeed, Felicis, First Round Capital, Chemistry, Quiet Capital, A*, Liquid 2 Ventures, Apolo Ohno, Joe Montana.

Thank you to Allie Garfinkle for telling our story so thoughtfully. You can find it in the comments.

â€”and finally, to the Assort team, who are in the arena and shipping product for patients every day!

-------------------------------------
Thankful to our many supporters Brenton Fargnoli, M.D., Sebastian Duesterhoeft, Will Kohler, Bill Trenchard, Kristina Shen, Matt Humphrey, Mark Goldberg, Ethan Kurzweil, Amit Garg, Ian Feeney, Ali Javid, Bobby Green, M.D., Cameron Woodward, Aditya Khosla, Allison Pickens, Jay Desai, Andrew Tan, Jenny Friedman, Immad Akhund, Umesh Khanna, Kemuel Carey, Parinita Amin, Titus Abraham, Mandy McClellan, Roy Rosin, Emery Rosansky, and many more. We wouldn't be here without you!


#healthcare #AI #digitalhealth #patientexperience #SeriesB #startup #patientengagement

author.headline: Founder, co-CEO at Assort Health - specialty-trained voice AI to answer patient calls

data.text:
Waiting on an endless hold while navigating a stressful health event was the straw that broke the camel's back for my parent. I think we can all agree that no one's care journey should involve 30+ minute hold times. At Assort Health, weâ€™re working to fix that. Today marks an exciting milestone for our team as we just closed our Series B to help scale Assort OS, our all-in-one platform designed to streamline the patient experience.

I'm tremendously proud of our mission and even prouder of the people behind it ğŸ’™

Come join us! https://lnkd.in/gBn3Gu-5

In just 48 hours, the team shipped 51 PRs focused on ensuring continued uptime and reliability through enhancing observability, migrating to modern frameworks, eliminating tech debt, and strengthening our test coverage.

At Assort Health, we move fastâ€”but never at the expense of quality and reliability. If building impactful health tech with a driven, quality-focused team sounds exciting to you, I'd love to connect! jeff@assorthealth.com

author.headline: Founder, co-CEO at Assort Health - Specialty-specific voice AI to answer patient calls

data.text:
Sean came to us with a patient access crisis.

After COVID, staffing the call center has been a nightmare, as turnover and burnout have skyrocketed like never before. Patients were calling in and waiting 25 minutes on hold to get an appointment.

We're excited to share our work with Sean ONeal, CEO of Kennedy White Orthopedic Center over the past year to improve access for their patients in Sarasota, Florida. 

Assort Health's Generative Voice AI assistants now answer every call so patients can no longer wait on hold and get access to their appointments within minutes.

A few metrics we're proud:
- 57% reduction in call abandonment rates
- 159 appointments booked daily
- 53% of scheduling volume handled with no human intervention

From Sean himself:
â€œAssort's orthopedic AI ensures our patients are greeted with immediate attention while freeing up our staff to focus on higher-value interactions.â€" Sean

AI isn't just about automating callsâ€”it's about improving patient care and freeing staff to focus on what matters most. If your 2025 roadmap includes enhancing patient access while cutting operational costs, DM me to schedule a tailored demo!

#AIHealthCare #Orthopedics #PatientAccess #AssortHealth #HealthcareInnovation #AIVoice #AIAgents

author.headline: SVP of Ops @ Assort Health

data.text:
Thrilled to be speaking on the State of AI in Orthopedics at the American Alliance of Orthopaedic Executives (AAOE) this May, alongside some other great colleagues Ali Bakhshinejad and Ross Rigdon.

In healthcare, every call matters. With our Generative Voice AI, orthopedic groups nationwide are revolutionizing patient access and business efficiency by handling hundreds of thousands of patient calls 24/7. Our Voice AI not only boosts appointment access but also streamlines operations to help practices focus on care delivery.

I'm looking forward to sharing our insights and innovations with AAOE members and discussing the future of AI-driven patient engagement in orthopedics. 

If youâ€™re attending, letâ€™s connect and explore how AI can elevate your ortho practiceâ€™s performance. Reach out to learn more!

author.headline: SVP of Ops @ Assort Health

resharedPost.text:
Iâ€™m excited to share that Duco has released our Trust & Safety Market Research Report with support from the Future of Online Trust and Safety Fund! 

T&S efforts have never been more important in this era of heightened platform accountability from regulators, media, advertisers, and users - especially as elections and global conflicts will have all eyes on platforms for the foreseeable future. This report illustrates how T&S is essential for the success of online platforms, while emerging T&S software startups also provide a significant investment opportunity for investors. 

Thank you to the many T&S practitioners, vendors, and investors who informed the development of this report. We hope that the T&S industry will continue to see more investment for the services and solutions that keep our internet safe. 

Authors: Joe Ammirato, Vivian Chong, Josh Lawson, Maura O'Sullivan, Sarah C. Oh, Lauren Wagner
Contributors: SofÃ­a Arimany, Connie C., Kat Duffy, Michael Dworsky, Brian F., Kelly Graziadei, Lucia (Stacey) Harris, Sara Ittelson, Vaishnavi J, Agne Kaarlep, Christine Keung, John Redgrave, Aaron R., Alex Rosenblatt, Yoel Roth, Micah Schaffer, Tom Siegel, Derek Slater, Dave Willner, Glen Wise, Shu Dar Yao, JooHo Y., Nhathan Nguyen 

Huge thanks to Harmonic for helping to provide access to company data on the Trust and Safety industry.

Check it out here:

author.headline: Global leader at the intersection of policy, democracy, and technology. CEO of Anchor Change and Chief Global Affairs Officer, Duco Experts. Newsletter writer and podcast host.

data.text:
This report helps explain something that is often glossed over or taken for granted: why Trust & Safety is essential and impactful. It was so gratifying to contribute to this Trust & Safety Market Research Report. 

Thanks to the amazing team at Duco!
